/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and street lamps punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and light to the urban setting. The street itself is a hive of activity with cars and buses in motion, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
